channel.title: Dragon Scimitar Vanish [Plz Help Me I Beg]
channel.description: :eek: well i got my server going well, but every time you weild a dragon scimitar and log out and back in it vanishes. i know i posted this twice and i should nt have done but i realy need help with this plz can someone help me.
